features: Modes include High Steady, Medium Steady, Low Steady, DayTime Pulse, NightTime Pulse, and Economic Flash
Fully USB rechargeable-no batteries to buy or replace
Memory function-light turns on at the last mode it was turned off
Power saving function-10% power or less, lights will automatically switch to lowest lumen output side illumination ports
Built-in battery indicators: Red=less than 25%, Green=fully charged
Side light holes allow the rider to be seen when crossing the traffic lanes
Numerous mounting options-vertical or horizontal mounting options as well as a clip for mounting on a backpack, purse or belt
